description: This table contains data for the Discrete Goals (IGO) masterfile that is over-time data.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user (EMP) ID of the person who entered this data.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: Patient CSN (contact serial number I.E. unique contact identifier) associated with a particular IGO (goal) contact.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current status of the goal record


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Done


Deleted

columns.name: INSTNT_OF_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of edit for this contact.

columns.name: LOW_VALUE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Low value for the goal value range

columns.name: HIGH_VALUE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: High value for goal value range

columns.name: COMPLIANCE_VALUE_NAME
columns.description:
Current outcome value for the goal. This column stores the manually tracked goal compliance value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not on track


On track


Improving


No change


Worsening

columns.name: MYC_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the proxy/patient (WPR) ID of the proxy/patient who added or edited a goal from MyChart.

columns.name: PT_STATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not a goal is patient-stated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: LONG_RANGE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the goal is a long-range goal or a short-term goal.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PT_STATED_YN

columns.name: LINKED_LONG_RANGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the long-range goal that this short-term goal is linked to.

columns.name: OUTPAT_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Outpatient Priority


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


High


Medium


Low
